channel.title: I need help adding the ::unjail command
channel.description: I got a leech server and i need someone to go onto team viewer and to help me add the ::unjail command.

item.title: I need help adding the ::unjail command
item.dc:creator: @iminhec iminhec
item.description:
@iminhec wrote:

how do i know where in client.java to put the codes?this is my client.java if u wana download it fix it and post the ficed one.

Read full topic

item.source: I need help adding the ::unjail command

item.title: I need help adding the ::unjail command
item.dc:creator: @jagex4lmo jagex4lmo
item.description:
@jagex4lmo wrote:

if (command.startsWith(“unjail”) && playerRights >= 1) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(7);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
if (otherPIndex != -1) {
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
p.action = 0;
sM(“You have unjailed “+p.playerName+”.”);
p.toX = 2933;
p.toY = 3293;
} else {
sM(“The name doesnt exist.”);
}
} catch (Exception e) {
sM(“Try entering the name of the person that you want to unjail.”);
}
}

Read full topic

item.source: I need help adding the ::unjail command

item.title: I need help adding the ::unjail command
item.dc:creator: @lord_fear lord_fear
item.description:
@lord_fear wrote:

[quote=“john55223v2, post:2, topic:355884”]uhh, may i just post mine, then you go into client.java, go under jail and paste this? o and make sure you change the coords to were you want them to apear when they are unjailed.

if (command.startsWith(“unjail”) && playerRights >= 1) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(7);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                    p.toX = 2606;
		p.toY = 3093;
		p.action = 0;
                    p.sM(
                            "You have been unjailed by " + playerName);
		sM("You have unjailed "+p.playerName+".");

there are no errors. if you get errors it is NOT from this code, it is from how you put it in there.
if you want me to get on team viewer gimme the link lol never had it.[/quote]
Your a moron.

Here is it corrected, and it looks cleaner

if (command.startsWith("unjail") && playerRights >= 1) { try { String otherPName = command.substring(7); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); if (otherPIndex != -1) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; p.toX = 2606; p.toY = 3093; p.action = 0; p.sM("You have been unjailed by " + playerName); sM("You have unjailed "+p.playerName+"."); } } }
You may still have to change it though.

Read full topic

if (command.startsWith(“unjail”) && playerRights >= 1) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(7);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                    p.toX = 2606;

		p.action = 0;
                    p.sM(
                            "You have been unjailed by " + playerName);
		sM("You have unjailed "+p.playerName+".");

there are no errors. if you get errors it is NOT from this code, it is from how you put it in there.
if you want me to get on team viewer gimme the link lol never had it.[/quote]
